trans-unit.source: Indicates current system power status information.
trans-unit.target: 指示当前的系统电源状态信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PowerStatus> class represents information about the current AC line power status, battery charging status, and battery charge status.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PowerStatus>类表示有关当前的交流电源状态、 电池正在充电状态和电池电量状态的信息。

trans-unit.source: This class is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.PowerStatus%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class to indicate current system power information.
trans-unit.target: 此类由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.PowerStatus%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation>类，以指示当前的系统电源信息。

trans-unit.source: The following example lists all properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PowerStatus> class in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control and displays the current value of the associated property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control when a list item selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例列出的所有属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PowerStatus>类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控件，并显示中的关联属性的当前值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制时选择的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current battery charge status.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前的电池电量状态。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BatteryChargeStatus" /> values indicating the current battery charge level or charging status.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BatteryChargeStatus" /> 值之一，指示当前的电池电量级别或充电状态。

trans-unit.source: This property indicates the current battery charge level or battery charging status.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指示当前的电池电量或电池正在充电状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets the reported full charge lifetime of the primary battery power source in seconds.
trans-unit.target: 获取报告的主电池电源的完全充电寿命（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The reported number of seconds of battery life available when the battery is fully charged, or -1 if the battery life is unknown.
trans-unit.target: 报告的在电池完全充电时的电池寿命（秒数）；如果电池寿命未知，则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: Gets the approximate amount of full battery charge remaining.
trans-unit.target: 获取电池剩余电量的近似量。

trans-unit.source: The approximate amount, from 0.0 to 1.0, of full battery charge remaining.
trans-unit.target: 电池剩余电量的近似量（从 0.0 到 1.0）。

trans-unit.source: Gets the approximate number of seconds of battery time remaining.
trans-unit.target: 获取电池的剩余使用时间的近似秒数。

trans-unit.source: The approximate number of seconds of battery life remaining, or –1 if the approximate remaining battery life is unknown.
trans-unit.target: 电池剩余寿命的近似秒数；或者，如果近似的电池剩余寿命未知，则为 –1。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current system power status.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前的系统电源状态。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PowerLineStatus" /> values indicating the current system power status.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PowerLineStatus" /> 值之一，指示当前的系统电源状态。

trans-unit.source: This property indicates whether the system power is online, or that the system power status is unknown.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指示系统电源是否处于联机状态，或指示系统电源状态未知。
